name: Cheesy Lasagna Dip
description: Serve with a fresh crusty baguette or warm pitas for dunking.

ingredients.name: light cream cheese, at room temperature
Rosemary Garlic Seasoning
ingredients.additionalInstruction: or your favourite Epicure seasoning or dip mix

preparation: In a bowl, stir together cream cheese and Rosemary Garlic Seasoning. Set aside.

In Multipurpose Steamer, combine ground beef and Speedy Lasagna Seasoning. Cover; microwave on high at 1 min intervals, using the Ground Meat Separator to break apart large chunks, until cooked through, 2 min.
Stir in crushed tomatoes and cream cheese mixture. Cover; microwave on high at 1 min intervals, stirring well in between, until cheese melts and dip is hot, 2 - 3 min.
Sprinkle with mozzarella; microwave, uncovered, for 1 min or until cheese melts.
tips: For an upscale presentation, prepare dip without mozzarella topping. Turn into an oven-safe serving dish, then top with mozzarella. Place on a Sheet Pan. Broil until cheese melts and starts to brown.
